Class TeKris implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

delay

int delay
The delay between the drop of a block. It drops (increases) when the users score increases. The formula is: delayInitial * delayPercentage to the power (score / delayThreshold). If delayStepwise is true, the delay is adjusted each time the threshold of the score is reached. If delayStepwise is false, the delay is adjusted each time the score changes.

delayInitial

int delayInitial
The initial delay between the drop of a block

delayPercentage

double delayPercentage
The percentag the delay drops per times the threshold is reached at the score.

delayThreshold

int delayThreshold
The threshold value of the score. When this threshold is reached, the delay diminishes.

delayStepwise

boolean delayStepwise
Indicates if the stepwise or fluent.

board

TeKrisBoard board
The game board

gameRunner

java.lang.Thread gameRunner
The game thread

width

int width
Pixelsize of the board

height

int height
Pixelsize of the board

x

int x
Dimension of the board

y

int y
Dimension of the board

scoreBoard

TeKrisScoreBoard scoreBoard
ScoreBoard

gameOver

boolean gameOver
Is the game over?
